`r NVIpkg_inline` is part of `NVIverse`, a collection of R-packages with tools to facilitate data management
and data reporting at the Norwegian Veterinary Institute (NVI). The `NVIverse` consists of the following packages:
`r paste0('\x60', paste(NVIrpackages::NVIpackages$Package, collapse = "\x60, \x60"), '\x60')`. See [`r  paste("Contribute to", NVIpkg)`](`r  paste0("https://github.com/NorwegianVeterinaryInstitute/", NVIpkg, "/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md")`) for
more information.
